item.title: Hotwire - Turbo
item.description: Migraton: https://dev.to/coorasse/from-turbolinks-to-turbo-31jl Drive A page navigation is seen as a visit which is connected to an ’action’. An action can either be [:advance, :replace, :restoration]. If the page in question can be found in cache it will be preloaded to give the appearance of faster loading between frequently visited pages. If the iOS Adapter or Android adapter are used then the turbo drive will push the new navigiation onto the navigation stack in the native format.
